allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add quest system and free tier credit improvements

Implemented a quest system allowing users to earn bonus credits by following social media accounts, and improved the free tier credit system with a welcome bonus and daily credits.

Key changes:
- Quest system: Users can earn 10 credits each for following on Twitter, Discord, Facebook, and TikTok
- Free tier improvements: 50 credit welcome bonus + 10 credits/day (capped at 50)
- New database tables: quests table with completion tracking
- New API endpoints: GET /api/quests and POST /api/quests/complete
- UI improvements: Credits badge moved to header with gift icon for quest access
- Quest modal with social media follow buttons
- Schema updates: Added welcomeBonusClaimed field and quests table
- New starter plan tier ($9.99/month) with 200 credits and SORA 2 access
- Development authentication system for local testing

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

- Discord: Real server invite link
